website_summaries.verdict: A quality men's facial lotion that includes natural ingredients, smells nice, and absorbs quickly – and a nice price.
pros: A lightweight formula with natural plant-based ingredients that make it suitable for most types of skin
Scent is very light and refreshing
A little goes a long way
Made without harsh ingredients or animal testing
cons: If you prefer a thicker lotion, you may find the consistency a bit too thin

customer_reviews.title: Avoid if you are prone to breakouts
customer_reviews.text: If your skin is even a little bit prone to breakouts, you want to avoid this product. I purchased it without reading the list of ingredients, when it arrived I saw that it contains isopropyl myristate and stearic acid, two of the most "pore clogging" and acne producing ingredients according to numerous dermatological studies.
customer_reviews.author: vanya

customer_reviews.title: Goes from greasy to breezy
customer_reviews.text: Great facial moisturizer for guys. At first, I was worried it was going to be greasy because it does have that feeling at first as you put it on your hands and face to apply but I was wrong. Lotion gets a smooth feeling to it and has my rough,dry face feeling soft and smooth and now I am instantly more bangable. I would recommend at least rinsing your face off first before applying, seems to help me anyway. Great stuff, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, I can't wait to check out their other products. A little really goes a long way and it keeps my face feeling moisturized but not oily. The scent is masculine but not offencive at all, very subtle. Hard to say no for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Punio

customer_reviews.title: A Great Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: As a man in my early twenties I have never really given much thought to skin care. I recently decided to purchase some products due to some breakouts, however. It has a very pleasant scent that smells fresh and not at all feminine which helped greatly with my hangups about using some of this stuff. I very much recommend this product, and I look forward to using it more in the future myself.

customer_reviews.text: I love this lotion for several reasons. I’m a middle aged man who moisturizes daily, I also have sensitive skin. It is indeed lightweight. It is not greasy whatsoever, but still does a fine job moisturizing his face. The scent is quite pleasant; just a fresh clean smell. I'm happy to say that it gets 5 stars. He's a fan, so I am too. We'd highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: FlyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Subtle scent and truly a non-greasy face moisturizer

Either it has dissipated or I'm getting used to it, but if you are sensitive to fragrance check this out before buying. I suspect it's the algae, or willowbark. UPDATE Either I'm used to the smell or it mellows after opening, but this is good stuff and the price is right. I'm on my second tube.

That said, I gave it two weeks of consistent use to see if it was just an adjustment period to the new product, but that didn't work. My recommendation is to find a lighter weight product if you have dry sensitive skin; especially if you plan to use on your face.

I am using less of this than I used to use of my previous moisturizer (Lush's Cosmetic Lad), and it is about half the cost. No issues with breakouts, scent, etc. And though the initial feel of the moisturizer might make you wonder if it will work, once you work it into your face, you'll be a believer.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I waited to review this product until I was sure that it worked. Well, it certainly did! I am impressed with the simplicity and effectiveness of this moisturizer. It feels great on my skin, isn't greasy and absorbs easily. No worries about additional and unnecessary ingredients either. Well done Marlowe!
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Not quite enough for my dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this in the mornings and nights after my shower for about 2 weeks. I don’t know if it’s the product or just my skin but I still feel very dry after using it. I do have exceptionally dry skin though. Aside from it not feeling like it’s moisturizing I wish it had some amount of SPF. The scent is great and it certainly feels very lightweight. I probably won’t by this again but I would try other products from Marlowe.

customer_reviews.title: Will not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like this product. It leaves me feeling sticky after application it’s really gritty and I end up applying some other lotion to my face before the day is over. The only thing positive I can say about this product is I have far less breakouts while using it.

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it has no fragrance, it goes on smoothly and drys quickly and is doing exactly what I wanted it to. My face is smooth, the dry flakes have disappeared and face has a good feel to it. I would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: This is good stuff!

customer_reviews.text: Not bad. I do find myself using a bit more than usual for this to work on me. The scent is nice, it's very minimal and doesn't linger. I also like that it's matte and not greasy. Overall, it's nice and it works.

customer_reviews.title: A great summer moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: • With the weather getting warmer, the lightweight texture allows for a smooth spread that doesn’t leave my face feeling oily or tight. • It’s also formulated with a TON of different extracts like passionflower, green tea, willow bark, and deep sea algae — the combination of which soothes and hydrates the skin while repairing it and keeping it moisturized. TBH, it could also pass as a heavier serum. • Although it’s marketed as a men’s moisturizer, I don’t see why women can’t use it as well! But if that’s what it takes for men to begin taking care of their skin, I’m all for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristian Aguilo

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and helps keep my skin from drying out
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: No reason not to buy
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is very moisturizing, but does not give you issues with acne. Although when you smell it it has a moisturizer scent, it doesn't give it off after you apply it. I didn't have very dry skin, but I could have used a slight touch up, and after just a few days of applying it about twice a day, it has done wonders without giving my face the oily look. I would strongly recommend this moisturizer for anyone that wants smooth, moisturized skin, without comprimizing on anything.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended

customer_reviews.author: Lady M

customer_reviews.title: Better than most at any price !
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a men’s moisturizer for a few months but found most of them too heavily scented or too expensive for daily use. Marlowe’s 123 fits the bill nicely. Light scent, not heavy consistency, and priced right. It also prevents shaving irritation. Can’t recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Jones

customer_reviews.title: Acne, fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I like a lot of the ingredients, but it is ruined by how potent the fragrance is. It’s the only thing that I changed in my skin care routine. Before this, I hadn’t had any acne for almost a year, but for the two weeks I used this moisturizer, I keep waking up to new acne because of how strong the fragrance is. It sets well on the skin, but it breaks me out. I would try this again if it were fragrance-free.
customer_reviews.author: A Mil

customer_reviews.title: Buy more than one!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this once/twice a day, when I can remember, as it yields a smooth, moisturized face! Big fan of all the Marlowe products, as they're within reach price-wise. A single bottle has last ~2.5 months, which for the price given, isn't too shabby. Only gripe is that some may be turned away by the smell, but it personally smells great! Gonna pick up another bottle sometime in the next few days!! -Coleman
customer_reviews.author: Coleman Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Love this moisturizer! I won't use anything else ever again!

I tend to have a shiny appearance to my skin, and while this doesn't (and isn't supposed to fix that) it does help in some way. A bottle will last me about 6-8 weeks, and I can't see myself using anything else at this point. Highly recommend - love this moisturizer!

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!

With this lotion, if i miss a day my face still stays fairly soft, despite my moderate dry skin. Long story short, for me, this lotion was great, and ill continue to purchase.

product_meta.title: MARLOWE. No. 123 Men's Facial Moisturizer 6 oz | Lightweight Daily Face Lotion for Men | Best for Dry or Oily Skin | Made with Natural Ingredients & Anti-Aging Extracts
feature_bullets: HYDRATE DRY SKIN, NO GREASY FEELING: MARLOWE's lightweight face moisturizer brings hydration to a cleansed face, providing natural anti-aging & moisturizing effects. This cream works great on dry or oily skin.

EXPERIENCE THE MARLOWE DIFFERENCE: Our men’s face lotion is made with our proprietary Marlowe. M Blend: a unique natural formulation of passionflower fruit, green tea, and willow bark extracts designed to best nourish, smooth, and revitalize skin.
REFRESHING SCENT: Lightly scented with a clean balance of aloe and citrus followed by a woody base.

WATER-BASED NATURAL LOTION: Our face cream is suitable for all skin types, but especially for those with oily skin, being a water-based lotion and extremely lightweight (while packing a great punch of nourishing extracts).
NO BAD STUFF & MADE RIGHT HERE: Paraben-free and phthalate-free, cruelty-free (not tested on animals), and made in the USA.
